hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I wanted to live abroad pharmaphenix I am passionate about investing and technology. In 2010, I co-founded Motif Investing, an innovative personal-investing site that allows you to easily invest in the latest trends and ideas. I'm now the CEO. Prior to Motif, I spent over six years at Microsoft, where I started as director of corporate development and strategy, the team responsible for managing all of Microsoft's investments and acquisitions. Later I was general manager of Microsoft's Enterprise Services business. I began my career as a consultant with The Boston Consulting Group. I hold a BS in economics and engineering from Yale University, and an MBA from the Wharton School of Business. I am a member of FINRA's Small Firm Advisory Board and FINRA's Technology Advisory Committee. I love trading commodities motifs and investing in technology motifs. Follow me on Twitter or Facebook.
